arts.ttl: Emiliano Buendia to Leeds United twist as Man United legend eyes transfer hijack
arts.sum: Besiktas have reportedly entered the race to sign Emi Buendia amid transfer interest from Leeds United. But Villa boss Unai Emery suggested at full-time that his start in the Champions League is likely to have been an anomaly .

arts.ttl: Sky Sports: Leeds United make move to sign striker as Patrick Bamford replacement
arts.sum: Leeds United are reportedly among three Championship clubs considering a loan move for Willem Geubbels, St. Gallen’s French striker. Sky Sports News journalist Lyall Thomas has stated that the Whites, Norwich City, and West Bromwich Albion, are eyeing Geubbels as a potential solution. Leeds are in a tight title race with Sheffield United. They sit […] The post Sky Sports: Leeds United make move to sign striker as Patrick Bamford replacement appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Championship round-up: Leeds return to summit with victory over Norwich
arts.sum: Leeds replaced Sheffield United at the summit of the Championship with a 2-0 victory over Norwich at Elland Road. Plymouth, who are five points adrift at the bottom of the table, showed greater resilience after the interval and managed to avoid conceding any further goals.

arts.ttl: Championship roundup: Burnley thrash Plymouth and Leeds return to top
arts.sum: Burnley win 5-0 at Home Park to keep pace with leaders Leeds back at summit after 2-0 win over Norwich Burnley scored five goals in a stunning first-half performance as they hammered relegation-threatened Plymouth 5-0 at Home Park to continue their promotion charge in the Championship. Zian Flemming and Josh Laurent bagged braces while Josh Cullen also struck in a remarkable opening 45 minutes to leave the Clarets, unbeaten in 15 games, two points behind second-placed Sheffield United. arts.ttl: Leeds boss Daniel Farke gets his wish as Manor Solomon stars in Norwich win
arts.sum: Leeds reclaimed top spot in the Championship with a 2-0 win over Norwich courtesy of a Manor Solomon masterclass to warm up for next week's clash with promotion rivals Burnley

arts.ttl: Daniel Farke leaves Leeds United transfer door open amid Patrick Bamford injury update
arts.sum: Farke expects Patrick Bamford to resume full training at the start of February. Due to the fact we had three proper nights at home, Solomon had time to recover with Monday to follow this.

arts.ttl: Paddy's Pointers: Four observations after Norwich's 2-0 Leeds defeat
arts.sum: Pink Un editor Paddy Davitt delivers his Leeds United verdict after the Canaries 2-0 Championship defeat

arts.ttl: Unhappy Norwich City boss questions key refereeing decision in Leeds United defeat
arts.sum: Head coach Johannes Hoff Thorup refused to blame referee Matt Donohue for Norwich City's 2-0 defeat to Leeds United. Goals either side of half-time from Solomon and Daniel James condemned the Canaries to a second defeat in Yorkshire in the space of five days.

arts.ttl: Leeds United star lucky to avoid red card against Norwich City after 'reckless' tackle
arts.sum: Former PGMOL general manager Hackett told MOT Leeds News : "Tanaka should have received a second yellow for this reckless challenge. The midfielder, who has been a big hit since moving to Elland Road last summer, was booked in the first half by referee Matthew Donohue for a late challenge on Emiliano Marcondes.

arts.ttl: Leeds ease past Norwich to take Champ top spot once again
arts.sum: Manor Solomon fired the quickest goal in the Championship this season as Leeds beat Norwich 2-0 at Elland Road to regain top spot.
